node.name: Calling cum Play Tablet MAKE: LENOVO MODEL: V7
node.description: Chinese technological giant brings the most diverse and up to date tablet which has 4G+WIFI connectivity and 2GB ram size. With android 9.0(Pie) operating system and snapdragon chipset it is on-grid tablet to play high graphic game like PUBG and thatâ€™s why fit into the class of my pick. (SIZE: 177x87x8mm / WEIGHT: 195 grams / RESOLUTION: 1080x2160 pixels)
node.content: 1> Mostly Chinese brands are one of the step makers in the non-premium market of gadgets like tablet & cellphone which they have already proven from this product that has 4G bandwidth of connectivity in single SIM slot /2> Full HD LCD screen with a resolution of 1080x2160 pixels, 2GB ram and 1.8GHz octa-core snapdragon processor make it completely multi-operational on Apps /3> Internal memory is 16GB, also extend to 64GB and rear camera is of 5 MP /4> Non-removable 5180mAh lithium-ion battery provides the back up of  5 hours of talking time at 100% charge /5> This tablet stands on every milestone of professional environment of continuous workload like editing and saving data.
node.alt: Lenovo Tab V7 Tablet 6.9 inch16 GB Wi-Fi  4G Voice Calling  Onyx Black

node.name: Galaxy Tablet MAKE: SAMSUNG MODEL: A7
node.description: Intelligent, innovative, durable and cost effective tablet with multi-touch touchscreen. Basic inventory like 3GB ram, Snapdragon processor and android 10.0 is install so that tablet can fulfil  the necessity of fast digital world.(SIZE: 250x157x7mm / WEIGHT: 476 grams / RESOLUTION: 1200x2000 pixels)
node.content: 1> Under Affordable pricing, this tablet lets you connect via WIFI to the internet /2> Improved surface capacitive touch give the feel of a premium product which is a correct statement for this tablet as it has a Snapdragon 662 processor of 2.0 GHz which can play high resolution or graphics demanding game as well as PUBG /3> Also, it comprises 32GB internal memory to store essential data from WhatsApp or Signal /4> 7040mAh lithium-ion battery provides 13 hours of backup and 8MP rear camera click the good quality of picture /5> Yes, it is installed with 802.11ac wireless receiver which can connect to 5.1 GHz frequency WiFi device that means it can go beyond the downloading speed of 54Mbps.
node.alt: Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 104 inch RAM 3 GB ROM 32 GBWi-Fi-only Silver

node.name: Calling cum Study Tablet MAKE: IKALL MODEL: N9
node.description: A make in India product for low-income family students who are eager to learn online. With 3G+WIFI connectivity, 1GB ram size and android 6.0(Marshmallow), this tablet fulfils the whole requirement of medium technicality under economical price. (SIZE: 185x106x 8mm / WEIGHT: 400 grams / RESOLUTION: 720x600 pixels)
node.content: 1> To satisfy the new demands of the current education system, this mini featured tablet has enough specifications like surface capacitive touch so that students scroll without struggle or flounder /2> Resolution of 720x600 pixels that support HD quality of video streaming with audio output of intermediate which is enough for focus student /3> It contains 4.7 Volt lithium-polymer battery which has a discharge time of 5 hours on continuous work and also time is taken to charge it 100% is around 1 hour /4> Processor speed is 1.3GHz which satisfy 3-4 application working at a single time but games like PUBG cannot run on this tablet /5> With a rear camera of 2MP and front camera of 420 pixels, it click the average quality of photo and selfie /6> This tablet is best for the online learning, surfing and can be used for playing small games.
node.alt: IKALL N9 Calling Tablet 7 Inch 1GB 8GB 3GCallingWiFi White

node.name: Galaxy Tablet MAKE: SAMSUNG MODEL: A 8.0
node.description: Worldwide trusted brand from South Korea continued the legacy in non-premium market of tablet with unrivalled configuration of 4G+WIFI connectivity, 2GB ram size, 32GB internal storage and TFT capacitive multi-touch touchscreen(Thin Film Transistor). (SIZE: 210x124x8mm / WEIGHT: 347 grams / RESOLUTION: 1280x800 pixels)
node.content: 1> With android 9.0(Pie) and single sim slot for compatibility  of 4G bandwidth this tablet is ready to go with any digital task of the student or office worker /2> Power packed with 2GHz Qualcomm processor and 2GB ram size which provide enough speed to play high graphics game like PUBG /3> 5100mAH lithium-ion battery powers the tablet for 2 days on normal work flow /4> 8MP rear camera and 2MP front camera are paired with adjustable focus application which clicks excellent quality of picture even in night /5> It comprise all the inbuilt editorial features like MS-Office or Adobe so that one can perform the work on travelling.
node.alt: Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8.0 Silver 2GB RAM 32GB Storage WiFi  4G
